DOC.brief_summary: A prospective , single-center , single-arm , trial demonstrate safety device performance ADVA-Tec Uriprene™ Degradable Temporary Ureteral Stent . This first-in-man clinical study small human population .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Study Uriprene Stent Following Uncomplicated Ureteroscopy
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Objective : To assess safety feasibility Uriprene® Stent assess time complete degradation passage stent fragment bladder radiological assessment . Subject Population : Patients clinical symptom consistent unilateral ureteral renal stone fragment ≤ 2mm , post-uncomplicated ureteroscopy ( UURS ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients > 18 , < 80 year age ; inclusive male female . 2 . Patients unilateral ureteral renal stone fragment < 2mm , postuncomplicated ureteroscopy ( UURS ) . 3 . Patients height body size able accommodate 20 , 22 , 24 , 26 , 28 , 30 mm long ureteral stent , judge Investigator . 4 . Patients ability understand requirement study , provide write informed consent , agree return require followup assessment . 1 . Patients know contraindication treatment Uriprene® Stent . 2 . Patients history anatomical abnormality urinary tract . 3 . Patients know upper low urinary tract infection time stent insertion . 4 . Patients know renal insufficiency chronic impairment . 5 . Any condition , opinion investigator , patient would eligible treatment Uriprene® Stent . 6 . Pregnant lactate woman , woman childbearing potential employ reliable method contraception judge Investigator . 7 . Patients consume 14 drink alcohol per week ( may affect degradation stent ) . 8 . Presence ureteral blockage stricture 9 . After fail guide wire placement fail ureteroscopic access 10 . Impacted ureteral stone still place 11 . Patients predispose urinary stasis e.g . neurogenic bladder , bladder outlet obstruction , know pregnancy 12 . Patients solitary kidney 13 . Presence ureteral fistula 14 . Presence ureteral tumor 15 . Presence extrinsic compression ureter 16 . Urinary tract infection 17 . Staghorn calculus
